definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Cellophane flowers of yellow and green.
Now you can fluff out the remaining cellophane above the curling ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 現在你可以出絨毛其餘玻璃紙以上蜷曲絲帶。

sentences.english: When used as a wrapper, cellophane lets the purchaser see the contents of the package.
sentences.chinese: 用玻璃紙包裝使購買者能看到包內的物品。

sentences.english: Gift baskets are wrapped using cellophane as well as some scotch tape to close the sides.
sentences.chinese: 禮籃包裝用玻璃紙，以及一些透明膠帶關閉兩側。

sentences.english: To prevent splintering, some owners wrap the sticks with cellophane tape.
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止開裂，一些使用者用玻璃紙帶將它裹一圈。

sentences.english: Purple color film and blue glassy-paper have the highest and lowest transmissivity , respectively.
sentences.chinese: 紫色覆蓋膜與藍色玻璃紙的穿透率分別爲最高與最低。

sentences.english: Well, I'll wrap them up in cellophane and tie the bundle up nicely in a blue ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 行，我會用玻璃紙把它們包好，再用藍絲帶紮上。

sentences.english: We wrapped the newly bought roses in cellophane.
sentences.chinese: 我們將新買的玫瑰花包上了玻璃紙。

sentences.english: Each piece of Dyed Poplin bears face plait stamping and is wrapped in cellophane with a paper hand at each end.
sentences.chinese: 染色府綢每匹蓋有梢印外包玻璃紙，兩端各系有紙帶。

sentences.english: Do not use cellophane tape or rope to seal your shipment.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用玻璃紙的帶子或繩子封箱託運貨物。

sentences.english: like I took it through cellophane."
